quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Odd Couple and The Odd Couple
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, actor, mearth. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: What was the name of Felixs ex wife on the show The Odd Couple?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Gloria

questions.question: What year did the prime-time television show The Odd Couple first hit the airwaves?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1970

questions.question: What did Felix Unger do for a living on the sitcom The Odd Couple?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He was a freelance photographer

questions.question: This character from the TV series The Odd Couple was Oscar and Felixs friend, who worked for the New York City Police Department.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Murray

questions.question: What famous actor portrayed Mearth, Morks son, on the sci-fi-based sitcom Mork and Mindy?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jonathan Winters

questions.question: Actor and singer Leif Garrett appeared on the ABC TV show The Odd Couple.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Who played the role of Oscars ex wife Blanche Madison on the TV show The Odd Couple?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Brett Somers

questions.question: In the TV series The Odd Couple, Oscar Madison was a sportswriter for what newspaper?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: New York Herald

questions.question: Mork and Mindy appeared as a spin-off of what other popular American sitcom?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Happy Days

questions.question: How many seasons did the popular American sitcom Mork and Mindy air?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 4

questions.question: This grey-haired man from the sitcom The Odd Couple was Oscar and Felixs friend, who used to come over and play cards with them.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Speed

questions.question: Professional tennis player Billie Jean King made an appearance on the show The Odd Couple.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Felix and Oscar, the main characters on the show The Odd Couple, lived in which city?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: New York City

questions.question: At the end of each Mork and Mndy show Mork gave a verbal report to the Orkan leader back on Ork. What was his name?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Orson

questions.question: In the Mork and Mindy TV series Mork and Mindy lived in what town?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Boulder, Colorado

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Mindy and Brady Bunch
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, leader, juliet. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: What sort of store did Mindys father, Fred McConnell, run in the TV series Mork and Mindy?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Music Store

questions.question: In the sitcom The Brady Bunch, Peter saves a little girls life in a toy store and he ends up getting a truckload of toys as a reward.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: What was the nickname of  Carol Bradys old football playing boyfriend in The Brady Bunch who ends up betting against his own alma mater?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Tank

questions.question: Who played the grizzled old prospector who locks the Bradys up in a jail cell in the famed Grand Canyon episode of The Brady Bunch?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jim Backus

questions.question: Mindy on the Mork and Mindy show was studying to be what?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A journalist

questions.question: How did Mork drink on the Mork and Mindy sitcom?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: With his finger

questions.question: In the episode of The Brady Bunch where Greg creates a Pilgrim home movie as a school project, who is the snowmaker in the winter scene?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Peter

questions.question: Who portrayed Exidor, a UFO prophet and leader of the Invisible Friends of Venus on the Mork and Mindy show?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Robert Donner

questions.question: In The Brady Bunch when Bobby and Greg are locked in a meat locker, Sam the butcher calls Bobby by what name?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Shrimpo

questions.question: When Marcia is picked to play Juliet in Romeo and Juliet in an episode of The Brady Bunch, what were the two odd features of the boy who played Romeo?

options.text: He had thick, dark glasses and a squeaky voice when upset.
He had orange hair and was not as tall as Marcia.
He had white hair and wore sunglasses.
He was nearsighted and too shy to say his lines.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He had thick, dark glasses and a squeaky voice when upset.

questions.question: When Jan, a character from The Brady Bunch rides her bike down the driveway without her glasses, she hits into what?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A special framed portrait

questions.question: In the episode of The Brady Bunch, titled Two Petes in a Pod, Peter meets his exact double to help him with two dates in the same night. What was Peters costume for the Halloween date?

options.text: He didnt dress up. The double did.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dracula

questions.question: Mr. Bickley, who lived in the downstairs apartment on Mork and Mindy and wrote greeting cards was portrayed by what actor?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Tom Poston

questions.question: From what high school was the quarterback who tried to use Marcia to get to Gregs playbook in The Brady Bunch?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Fairview

questions.question: What word did Mork use when he got angry or frustrated on the Mork and Mindy show?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Shazbat

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Saturday Night Live and Cast
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, john, actor. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: In an episode of I Love Lucy, Lucy takes a tour of Hollywood celebrity homes. She gets off the tour bus and climbs a wall to try and pick a grapefruit from the backyard of which actor?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Richard Widmark

questions.question: In 1982, this person became the youngest host ever of the long running television show Saturday Night Live.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Drew Barrymore

questions.question: What year did the show Saturday Night Live first hit the airwaves?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1975

questions.question: John Belushi was a SNL cast member when he died of a drug overdose on March 5th 1982.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: Which one of these joined the cast of SNL after hosting the show?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Billy Crystal

questions.question: Who was the first performer on Saturday Night Live to simultaneously host the show and also appear as the musical guest?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Paul Simon

questions.question: Who became the youngest SNL cast member, after joining the the cast in 1985?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Anthony Michael Hall

questions.question: How does Phoebe get Chandler to stop smoking on the TV show Friends?

options.text: She tells him she wont hang out with him.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: She gives him $7,000.

questions.question: In 2006, this singer broke the record for the longest span in between musical guest spots on the hit television show Saturday Night Live.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Prince

questions.question: SNLs cast member Maya Rudolph is the daughter of 70s singing sensation Minnie Ripperton.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: This actors film credits include The Sand Pebbles (1966), Wait Until Dark (1967), Body Heat (1981) and First Blood (1982).
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Richard Crenna

questions.question: Who was the first person to actually host the show Saturday Night Live, while still being an active cast member?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Eddie Murphy

questions.question: Who is the creator of the long running television show Saturday Night Live?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Lorne Michaels

questions.question: This actor, born Marion Morrison in 1907, starred in the 1952 movie The Quiet Man.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: John Wayne

questions.question: Who was the first person to host the show Saturday Night Live?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: George Carlin

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Friends and Character
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, actor, abc. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Who is the priest at Pheobe and Mikes wedding on the sitcom Friends?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Joey

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1977

questions.question: This actress portrayed Sandra Sue Abbott, a character in Eight is Enough, who married Tom.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Betty Buckley

questions.question: What is Rachels middle name in the TV series Friends?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Karen

questions.question: What holiday does Chandler from Friends boycott?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Thanksgiving

questions.question: Who inspired Friends character Joey to become an actor?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Al Pacino

questions.question: Grant Goodeve, who played David in Eight is Enough, also sang the theme song of the show.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Which character on Friends had a third nipple which he/she called a nubbin?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Chandler

questions.question: Friends character Chandler once kissed a man.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Was actor Ralph Macchio ever a regular on the ABC show Eight is Enough?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Yes

questions.question: In an attempt to teach Ben about the importance of Hanukkah the guys from Friends dress up as what?

options.text: Mr. Rogers, Cousin It and Michael Jackson
The Tooth Fairy, Batman and Spok.
Santa Claus, the Easter Bunny and a giant menorah.
Santa Claus, Superman and an Armadillo

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Santa Claus, Superman and an Armadillo

questions.question: What were the names of the five daughters on the show Eight is Enough?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mary, Nancy, Joanie, Susan, Elizabeth

questions.question: Who played the role of Tom Bradford, the father of eight children in the TV series Eight is Enough?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dick Van Patten

questions.question: Which family with 8 children was featured on the ABC show Eight is Enough?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Bradford

questions.question: Which actress guest-starred on Friends as Rachels sister?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Reese Witherspoon

questions.question: In 1957, John Forsythe was the TV dad of Kelly, played by Noreen Corcoran.

Erin Moran, Marion Ross and Ron Howard
Pat Morita, Al Molinaro and Suzi Quatro

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Series and Charlies Angels
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, actor, john. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: In the sitcom Father Knows Best what was the last name of Jim?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Anderson

questions.question: This 1990s dad invented Festivus, the holiday for the rest of us and had a paralyzing fear of mice.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Frank Costanza

questions.question: Jack Arnold, a furniture business owner was father to whom in this series which ran from 1988-1993?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Karen

questions.question: Charlies Angels, broadcast from 1976 to 1981, was a television series about three women who work for what fictional private investigation agency?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Charles Townsend Agency

questions.question: Name the episode from season one of Charlies Angels, in which a woman hired the angels to find her sister, who had disappeared from a womens prison farm.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Angels in Chains

questions.question: This actor portrayed John Bosley in the 2000 movie Charlies Angels, based on the famous TV series.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Bill Murray

questions.question: Kelly Garrett, a character on TV series Charlies Angels, portrayed by Jaclyn Smith, drove what kind of car?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ford Mustang

questions.question: This 1990s TV series starred a divorced session musician who had three kids named Anthony, Joey and Blossom.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Nick Russo

questions.question: This actress, who played Jill Munroe in the series Charlies Angels, left the show after the first season, to pursue a film career.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Farrah Fawcett

questions.question: These three actresses played the three original angels on the TV series, Charlies Angels.

options.text: Kate Jackson, Farrah Fawcett and Jacyln Smith
Kate Jackson, Shelley Hack and Farrah Fawcett
Kate Jackson, Farrah Fawcett and Cheryl Ladd
Farrah Fawcett, Cheryl Ladd and Tanya Roberts

questions.question: Tanya Roberts was the 7th and final angel to appear on TV series, Charlies Angels.

questions.question: This character from the TV series Charlies Angels was portrayed by television actress, Jaclyn Smith.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Kelly Garrett

questions.question: This 70s  80s sitcom was based on the BBC series called Til Death Us Do Part.  The dad in this series was a huge inspiration to Eric Cartman on Southpark.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: All In The Family
